person.persName: Richard Apperson Jr. (11th District Circuit Judge)

body.p: Mount Sterling, Kentucky, circuit judge. Mount Sterling, Kentucky, native. Married to Elizabeth Taylor on December 5, 1854. Owned at least four enslaved persons in 1860. Served as the circuit judge for the 11th District of Kentucky in 1865.
